content: 5 = 15 sts 10 k 47 k 11 k6 m1 x 5 = 35 sts 48 k1 k2tog x 5 = 10 sts 49 k2tog x 5 = 5 sts continue in white color yarn… do not bind off cut yarn leaving long tail and thread yarn tail onto 12 k large-eyed blunt needle thread needle through loops of the remaining 13 k7 m1 x 5 = 40 sts 5 sts but do not pull up to gather yet finish stuffing firmly when stuffed 14 k football should measure approx 11 around and be approx 6 ½ long from center of one end to the center of the other end then pull up on continue in main color yarn… yarn to gather stitches and secure…now at the cast-on edge thread 15 k8 m1 x 5 = 45 sts 16 k yarn tail onto large-eyed blunt needle thread needle through outer loops 17 k9 m1 x 5 = 50 sts of 5 cast-on stitches and pull up to gather and secure 18 k 19 k10 m1 x 5 = 55 sts create the laces on top using white yarn and a large-eyed blunt needle as 20-31 k in picture 32 k9 k2tog x 5 = 50 sts 33 k 34 k8 k2tog x 5 = 45 sts someone special is sure to enjoy continue in white color yarn… playing with this lil football 35 k 36 k7 k2tog x 5 = 40 sts 37 k 2 inquiries contact rainebodesigns@yahoo com ©2015 lorraine pistorio this pattern is not to be sold or given for free to others if you use this pattern to make items for commercial use please give me credit for the pattern please feel free to sell any completed items made from my designed pattern or donate any completed items to charity do not copy reproduce sell and/or distribute this pattern in any form this design and material is copyrighted and protected by federal copyright infringement
